page.title: 18School Camp,Mundesley,1985
page.content: to have a wash in cold water.Then we had to tidy up our tents.Everything had to be packed away before breakfast and we had to roll up our sleeping bags and blankets in the groundsheet to keep them dry if it rained. On Thursday morning we went into Mundesley for a walk around and then we played games on the park. In the afternoon we went on the beach.Mr Richards said we could have a paddle in the sea.We all had a paddle,even Mr Richards.Two of the children fell over in the sea and got soaked to the skin. Most of the others just got a little bit wet.When we were dry we played on the beach.After tea,there was a concert.Children from other schools did different things,like singing and dancing and telling jokes.One group of children did a short play.We didn't want to do anything,so we just watched
